title: We will build, not burn, our way into the future, says Bajaj Auto MD Rajiv Bajaj
description: "Over the last 20 years, Bajaj Auto has successfully executed two significant transformations - from being a scooter licensee to becoming a motorcycle innovator, and from being a domestic player to becoming a global powerhouse. During both these endeavours, we have demonstrated the ability to balance change with stability, and growth with profitability," says Bajaj Auto's MD Rajiv Bajaj
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
